verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Verse: 1
You're like starlight in the dark
Endless miles can't conceal you
And every glimmer is a spark
Catching fire as you break through

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Oh, you're not far away
You come in close
Oh, even as I wait
You come in close

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Verse: 2
You're like summer in the night
The sun goes down but still I feel you
And every shadow's turning bright
Every broken heart is made new

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Oh, you're not far away
You come in close
Oh, even as I wait
You come in close

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
Bridge: 1
There's no heart unseen
There's no space between
You and I, You and I
You are closer than
The very oxygen
I'm breathing in
I breathe you in

verse.name: b3
verse.lines:
Bridge: 2
You are God with us
You are here with us
Immanuel, Immanuel
You are infinite
Your glory has no end
Jesus, Jesus

verse.name: b5
verse.lines:
Bridge:
There's no heart unseen
There's no space between
You and I, You and I
You are closer than
The very oxygen
I'm breathing in
I breathe you in

verse.name: b6
verse.lines:
Bridge: 2
You are God with us
You are here with us
Immanuel, Immanuel
You are infinite
Your glory has no end
Jesus, Jesus

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Oh, you're not far away
You come in close
Oh, even as I wait
You come in close
